Text:

I don't have a mac at the office, so I couldn't tell you, but I'd guess you have to open the burnme file, burn the contents to a CDr. maybe boot your mac from it? Not sure about the readme file, .bf extension i'm not sure about.

brain f*ck.

getting the dvd burned was easy. alchemical symbols are hard.

Thats real good and all, that its brain F*ckingly working for you, but how about sharing and answering how to actually make the thing work, first of all i dont have the password that it asks for, so thats a start. anyone please... this thing looks really intriguing.
